sentences.en: Conditions are good in school. It's inexcusable not to study hard.
sentences.cn: 学校环境好, 不用功念书可说不过去.

sentences.en: He said the killing of innocent people was inexcusable.
sentences.cn: 他说滥杀无辜是不可原谅的。

sentences.en: His failure to turn his attention to flagrant wastes of public money is inexcusable.
sentences.cn: 他未能注意到公共资金的公然浪费，这是不可原谅的。
他的无礼是不可宽赦的.

sentences.en: I fear lest we commit an inexcusable blunder.
sentences.cn: 我为我们会犯不可原谅的错误而担忧.

sentences.en: It is very inexcusable in him if he stops to play with any other boys.
sentences.cn: 如果他搁下正事去跟别的孩子玩儿,那是不可原谅的.

sentences.en: It's not even about a terrible, inexcusable loss on Tuesday.
sentences.cn: 这一句仍在上面的排比之中, “ 这甚至与一场糟糕的 、 不可宽恕的失败无关. ”

sentences.en: Mr treatment of you was thoughtless, inexcusable!
sentences.cn: 我以前对你的态度是轻率的, 不可宽恕的.

sentences.en: Some will see this as an attempt to justify or excuse comments that are simply inexcusable.
sentences.cn: 有人会认为这是我为那些不能被饶恕的言论作开脱的努力.

sentences.en: The Home Office has been accused of inexcusable incompetence.
sentences.cn: 内政部被指责能力极其低下。

sentences.en: The shame that you have brought on us is inexcusable.
sentences.cn: 你给我们惹来的羞辱是无法宽恕的.

sentences.en: There was no excuse which didn't consist of the inexcusable.
sentences.cn: 他找不到任何可以求得谅解的借口.
你的行为是不能宽恕的.

words.tran_cn: 无法原谅地；无法辩解地

trans.tran_cn: 不可原谅的，不可宽恕的，百口莫辩
trans.tran_en: inexcusable behaviour is too bad to be excused
